TEXT.P: Barbie Hsu, better known as Da S, has confirmed her engagement to the son of a wealthy Chinese businessman, ending days of rumors about the couple's whirlwind romance.
The older of Taiwan's celebrity Hsu sisters described her happiness as she and partner Wang Xiaofei made the announcement Friday via micro-blog.
The two, who met less than three weeks ago in Beijing, are to be married in February next year, according to Da S's father.
Wang is reportedly worth NT$11.5 billion (US$376 million) through his involvement in a chain of restaurants owned by his father.
Younger sister, TV personality Dee Hsu, commonly known as Xiao S, could not confirm her sister's engagement when she took questions before a media engagement in Taipei Friday.
It was as the press conference was ending that the younger Hsu received news her sister had announced the engagement via the micro-blog.
"I can't believe it, I want to see (the blog)," said the younger sister.
